about_the_game:
Basic Introduction

Gmail email registration is not supported for the time being.

P.S. There are quite a number of problems, sometimes it's a bit wacky, and there are also bugs. It's a free product, mainly for fun, so please don't be too critical. Before 0:00 on January 1st, 2025, the first 3, middle 3, and last 3 comments of each person will be eligible to receive 150 yuan of game shopping funds!

It's a voice social software for two-dimensional virtual avatars based on the capture of a single camera.

After entering the application, users can set up their own two-dimensional virtual avatars. Subsequently, they can conduct voice chats by matching with other users. During the video chat process, they will use their own two-dimensional virtual avatars.

The application will project users' expressions and movements onto the two-dimensional virtual characters through facial recognition technology, thus enabling voice chat socialization. Users can manipulate the expressions of virtual characters through their own expressions. Briefly speaking, it's similar to the Avatar system. In the movie "Avatar", real bodies are manipulated, while players can manipulate two-dimensional virtual avatars through this application.

It will continue to be developed in the future, and functions such as users' custom uploading of network models will be added.

It also supports the individual anchor mode, the online social mode, and the desktop companion mode.

It supports full-body and half-body motion capture.

Desktop Companion Mode

You can chat with your friends while playing games, studying.

Normal Matching Mode

VRM

It supports uploading custom VRM models. (Only pre-made model matching is supported.)

short_description: I wanted to have a secondary voice social space that could be used for motion capture with just a normal webcam and only a low configuration computer. So VChat was born, and it supports both single-user virtual host mode and virtual image voice chatting and dating using network matching mode.
